attributes.action: Allow retained firefighters the use of flashing lights/beacons when responding to emergency calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lives of the general public are being put at risk as retained fire crews struggle through traffic in their personal vehicles at normal road speeds whilst on route to their fire stations in order to answer emergency calls. We retained firefighters currently have no way of making other road users aware that we are responding to an emergency call.
